title: Update coordinate refresh interval to 12s and SOS radius to 30m

requirements.text: Change the coordinate refresh/update interval to 12 seconds wherever the app periodically sends or refreshes location coordinates (ambulance and police location updates, and police-side polling of nearby ambulance locations). Update any user-facing text that mentions the old interval so it matches 12 seconds.

quotes: Bro change the refresh change time of the coordinates to 12 seconds and also change the radius to 30 meters

acceptanceCriteria: Ambulance location updates are sent to the backend every 12 seconds (not 3).
Police location updates are sent to the backend every 12 seconds (not 3).
Police-side polling for nearby ambulance locations runs every 12 seconds (not 3).
Any UI copy that states the update frequency reflects 12 seconds (e.g., badges/instructions).

requirements.text: Change the SOS targeting radius from 20 meters to 30 meters. Update backend SOS targeting logic to use 30 meters when selecting police units, and update ambulance UI copy that references the radius so it says 30 meters.

quotes: Bro change the refresh change time of the coordinates to 12 seconds and also change the radius to 30 meters

acceptanceCriteria: Backend SOS targeting filters police within 30 meters (0.03 km) instead of 20 meters (0.02 km).
Ambulance UI SOS status text and "How it works" bullet(s) reference 30 meters (not 20).
Behaviorally, a police unit at ~25m can be selected/targeted, while one at ~35m is not (assuming both have recent locations).

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not change the general police monitoring radius used for listing nearby ambulances (e.g., the 1.0km RADIUS_KM setting) unless required for the SOS radius change.
Do not change SOS duration or the number of police units targeted (keep nearest 2).
